data:
Enterprise-grade documentation for installing Jitsi Meet from source.This documentation is auto-aligned with the jitsi-master.sh installer and supports:
LAN / Home network deployments
Cloud / HTTPS deployments
Source builds (Prosody, Jicofo, JVB, Web UI)
Rollbacks and cleanups

!!! warning
Always run the installer as root.
sudo ./jitsi-master.sh
data.menu-flow#Menu Flow:
1) Prerequisites
2) Prosody
3) JVB
4) Jicofo
5) Web UI

data:
Built from source.
git clone https://github.com/jitsi/jicofo.git
mvn clean package -DskipTests
